title: Dacia Wolf & the Prophecy
description: What if you were told it was your destiny to save the world? Could you find the strength? Would you believe?In a world where magic is no more than sleight of hand, Dacia Wolf is an anomaly.Dacia has always felt like an outsider in her hometown of Bittersweet. Strange things happen in her presence, and the locals shy away from her. After setting her house on fire when she was six, even her parents fear her. The only constant in her life is her best friend, Cody Hawks.When Dacia leaves for college, she hopes her life is about to change for the better.Change comes, but will Dacia survive?Along with making a new friend, she's made a group of enemies. Nightmares plague Dacia's sleep and new abilities emerge.When her powers surface in class, Dacia is called into Dean Aspen's office. Instead of being expelled, she finds out the dean believes they are part of a prophecy involving a demon hell-bent on taking over the world.Dacia doesn't believe in prophecies or fate, but when she starts living her nightmares, she can't help but wonder if she is wrong.
author: Mandi Oyster
